metadata.name: Azure DevOps PR Reviewer
metadata.description: Comprehensive PR review with security scanning and test enforcement. Loads credentials from .env file.

_notes.authentication: This configuration uses PowerShell to load environment variables from .env file before starting the server
requirements: 2. .env must contain AZURE_DEVOPS_ORG, AZURE_DEVOPS_PROJECT, and AZURE_DEVOPS_PAT
3. PowerShell execution policy allows running scripts (handled by -ExecutionPolicy Bypass)
troubleshooting: To test Azure connection: python test_auth.py
_notes.alternative: If PowerShell doesn't work, use start_server_robust.py instead
